-----Original Message-----
From: Moss [mailto:Olmoss@...]
Sent: September 14, 2000 8:51 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lockpicking the Hole



Ack !!! I just found out my guild is going to take on the Hole in
Painheel tonight.
I understand a Bards Lock picking skill can be high enough to "pick the
rocks" and get in, so where can I go and get practice to get my skill up
? and... what, just hold a pair of lock picks over the "lock" and start
using them ? Any advice is appreciated :)
Thanks,
Moonflower Bllue 49th Bard
Cazic-Thule
